text: Bona (abahanahanisi) baza kuza nezizathu kuni xa nifika kubo. Yithi wena (Muhammad), (nifane) neza nezizathu, thina asiyi kunikholelwa. UAllâh sele Esixelele kakade ngeendaba eziphathelene nani. UAllâh noMthunywa waKhe Uza kuqwalasela izenzo zenu. Ekugqibeleni niza kubuyela kwakuSolwazi wokungabonwayo nokubonwayo, Aze Yena Anixelele ngoko nanikwenza (ehlabathini)
